item.title: 10cc - I'm Not In Love
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: Eric Stewart, Graham Gouldman
KY: 8497 / KY: 7640

I’m not in love
so don’t forget it
It’s just
a silly phase
I’m going through
and just because
I call you up
don’t get me wrong
Don’t think
you’ve got it made
I’m not in love no no
it’s because
I like to see you
but then again
That doesn’t mean
you mean
That much to me
so if I call you
Don’t make a fuss
don’t tell
Your friends
about the two of us
I’m not in love
no no it’s because-

I keep your picture
upon the wall
It hides a nasty stain
that’s lying there
So don’t you ask me
to give it back
I know you know
it doesn’t mean
That much to me
I’m not in love
No no it’s because ooh
you’ll wait
A long time for me
ooh you’ll wait
A long time
ooh you’ll wait
A long time for me
ooh you’ll wait
A long time
I’m not in love
So don’t forget it
it’s just
A silly phase
I’m going through
And just because
I call you up
Don’t get me wrong
don’t think
You’ve got it made
I’m not in love
I’m not
in love-
